Elaborated terms of service of this site:
Terms of service that are legally binding can be found in the link below.
Points that are worth mentioning are that you can only upload an image if you took it yourself, upload locations only on self-knowledge, GPS info or satellite imagery that are allowed in OpenStreetMap. 
The description of the points should be original text created by you.
All uploaded material will become publicly available.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Service: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
Report an issue instructions:
Please describe the problem as best as you can and attach screenshots that show it.

Unfortunately, we will not be able to help without the following information:
1. What happened?
2. At what date and time did it happen?
3. What did you do right before it happened?
4. Is this the first time it happened?
5. Is there a way to reproduce the problem?
Report an issue site instructions:
A report file was just downloaded. We need this file in order to better understand the issue.
Below is a button that allows you to send us a mail to support@mapeak.com.
After pressing this button please attach the downloaded file.
You can also open you favorite mail client without using the button below.
Thanks!
Request features and report bugs on our: Request features and report bugs on our Github project page
